reference.title: Data model reference
reference.shortdesc: Classes used by the module: Airport and Flight.

section.title: Airport
section.p: Common methods: getCode(), getCity(), getCountry(), setCity(city), setCountry(country)

section.title: Flight
section.p: Fields: flightNo (3 letters + 3 digits), origin (Airport), destination (Airport)
Validation: constructor raises TypeError if origin/destination are not Airport objects.
Domestic vs international: domestic when origin country equals destination country.
Equality: two flights are equal when their origin and destination match.
